message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think you'll find it very valuable. What do you say to a price of $130?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping for a lower price. How about $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, would it be possible to lower the price to $105?
